query:
SELECT 
  'Concorrentes' as tipo,
  fonte,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concorrentes), 2) as percentual
FROM concorrentes
GROUP BY fonte
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Leads' as tipo,
  fonte,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leads), 2) as percentual
FROM leads
GROUP BY fonte
ORDER BY tipo, total DESC;
